artwork.title: Kissing Circles
artwork.description: Kissing Circles is an artistic exploration of using a particular mathematical theorem, the Descartes' theorem, that can directly find the location of two circles inside and outside of three tangent circles. It is an exercise of pattern making using arithmetic and shaders, which are the main areas where I am passionate to learn more about.
